messages.text:
Hello! It looks like your message may have been cut off. How can I help you today?

I'm Klaus, a Solutions Architect & Cloud Infrastructure Specialist. I can assist with:

- **System design** - Architecture reviews, scalability planning, component relationships
- **Cloud infrastructure** - AWS, GCP, Azure design and optimization
- **DevOps & automation** - CI/CD, IaC, containerization, orchestration
- **Migration planning** - On-prem to cloud, cloud-to-cloud, modernization
- **Cost optimization** - FinOps, right-sizing, reserved capacity planning
- **Security & compliance** - Architecture patterns for regulated industries

What are you working on?

Hey! Looks like another short message — no worries, happens to the best of us.

A few possibilities for what you might be looking for:

| If you meant... | I can help with... |
|-----------------|-------------------|
| **AWS** | Architecture, cost optimization, Well-Architected reviews, specific service selection |
| **"Awe" as in impressive systems** | Case studies of scalable architectures, high-throughput designs, resilience patterns |
| **Something else entirely** | Just let me know — I'm flexible |

What direction were you heading?
